******************************************************************************/class AgentDto{constructor(userId,username,firstName,lastName,email,phoneType,phoneNumber,extension,encryptVoicemail,transcribeVoicemail,deliverSMS,deliverSMSPhoneNumber,deliverEmail){this.userId=userId;this.username=username;this.firstName=firstName;this.lastName=lastName;this.email=email;this.phoneType=phoneType;this.phoneNumber=phoneNumber;this.extension=extension;this.encryptVoicemail=encryptVoicemail;this.transcribeVoicemail=transcribeVoicemail;this.deliverSMS=deliverSMS;this.deliverSMSPhoneNumber=deliverSMSPhoneNumber;this.deliverEmail=deliverEmail;}static fromAgent(agent){return new this(agent.userId,agent.connectUser.username,agent.connectUser.firstName,agent.connectUser.lastName,agent.connectUser.email,AgentDto.phoneTypeToDisplayString(agent.connectUser.phoneType),agent.connectUser.deskPhoneNumber,agent.agent.extension,agent.agent.encryptVoicemail||false,agent.agent.transcribeVoicemail||false,agent.agent.deliveryOptions.sms.enabled||false,agent.agent.deliveryOptions.sms.phoneNumber,agent.agent.deliveryOptions.email||false);}static fromBasicAgent(agent){const sms=(agent.deliveryOptions||{}).sms||{};const deliveryOptions=agent.deliveryOptions||{};return new this(agent.userId,agent.username,"","","","","",agent.extension,agent.encryptVoicemail||false,agent.transcribeVoicemail||false,sms.enabled||false,sms.phoneNumber,deliveryOptions.email||false);}static phoneTypeToDisplayString(type){switch(type){case"SOFT_PHONE":return"Soft Phone";case"DESK_PHONE":return"Desk Phone";default:return"";}}}export default AgentDto;
